title: [Top of the World, Aenatumgana]
description: The horizon is painted with shifting color, strange flickers playing in the clouds like distant lightning tinted with a monumental paintbrush.  Underfoot, a small cliff is formed by a rock outcropping.  It narrows into a trail which leads up to the southeast.  Another narrow trail leads northwest from a ledge below, and beyond that, the mountainside extends down in a dizzying fall.

The horizon is painted with layers of clouds, waves of grey upon black roiling across the sky.  Underfoot, a small cliff is formed by a rock outcropping.  It narrows into a trail which leads up to the southeast.  Another narrow trail leads northwest from a ledge below, and beyond that, the mountainside extends down in a dizzying fall.
